refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: These API have been deprecated in favor of newer API, or because they were deemed unnecessary.

refsect2.title: hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_func ()
refsect2.programlisting: void hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_func (hb_font_funcs_t *ffuncs, hb_font_get_glyph_func_t func, void *user_data, hb_destroy_func_t destroy);

warning.para: hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_func has been deprecated since version 1.2.3 and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Deprecated. Use hb_font_funcs_set_nominal_glyph_func() and hb_font_funcs_set_variation_glyph_func() instead.

entry.para: function to call when user_data is not needed anymore.

refsect2.title: hb_font_get_glyph_func_t ()
refsect2.programlisting: hb_bool_t (*hb_font_get_glyph_func_t) (hb_font_t *font, void *font_data, hb_codepoint_t unicode, hb_codepoint_t variation_selector, hb_codepoint_t *glyph, void *user_data);

warning.para: hb_font_get_glyph_func_t has been deprecated since version 1.2.3 and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: A virtual method for the hb_font_funcs_t of an hb_font_t object.
This method should retrieve the glyph ID for a specified Unicode code point font, with an optional variation selector.

entry.para: The Unicode code point to query
The variation-selector code point to query
User data pointer passed by the caller

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: true if data found, false otherwise

refsect2.title: hb_ot_layout_table_choose_script ()

warning.para: hb_ot_layout_table_choose_script is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

entry.para: The index of the chosen script.

refsect2.title: hb_ot_layout_table_find_script ()
refsect2.programlisting: hb_bool_t hb_ot_layout_table_find_script (hb_face_t *face, hb_tag_t table_tag, hb_tag_t script_tag, unsigned int *script_index);
refsect2.para: Fetches the index if a given script tag in the specified face's GSUB table or GPOS table.

entry.para: hb_tag_t of the script tag requested
The index of the requested script tag.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: true if the script is found, false otherwise

refsect2.title: hb_ot_tag_from_language ()
refsect2.programlisting: hb_tag_t hb_ot_tag_from_language (hb_language_t language);

warning.para: hb_ot_tag_from_language has been deprecated since version 2.0.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.
use hb_ot_tags_from_script_and_language() instead

refsect2.para: Converts an hb_language_t to an hb_tag_t.

refsect2.title: hb_ot_tags_from_script ()
refsect2.programlisting: void hb_ot_tags_from_script (hb_script_t script, hb_tag_t *script_tag_1, hb_tag_t *script_tag_2);

warning.para: hb_ot_tags_from_script has been deprecated since version 2.0.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.
use hb_ot_tags_from_script_and_language() instead

refsect2.para: Converts an hb_script_t to script tags.

refsect2.title: hb_ot_var_find_axis ()
refsect2.programlisting: hb_bool_t hb_ot_var_find_axis (hb_face_t *face, hb_tag_t axis_tag, unsigned int *axis_index, hb_ot_var_axis_t *axis_info);

warning.para: hb_ot_var_find_axis has been deprecated since version 2.2.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Fetches the variation-axis information corresponding to the specified axis tag in the specified face.

entry.para: The hb_tag_t of the variation axis to query
The index of the variation axis
The hb_ot_var_axis_info_t of the axis tag queried.

refsect2.title: hb_ot_var_get_axes ()
refsect2.programlisting: unsigned int hb_ot_var_get_axes (hb_face_t *face, unsigned int start_offset, unsigned int *axes_count, hb_ot_var_axis_t *axes_array);

warning.para: hb_ot_var_get_axes has been deprecated since version 2.2.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.
use hb_ot_var_get_axis_infos() instead

refsect2.para: Fetches a list of all variation axes in the specified face. The list returned will begin at the offset provided.

entry.para: offset of the first lookup to retrieve
Input = the maximum number of variation axes to return; Output = the actual number of variation axes returned (may be zero).
The array of variation axes found.

refsect2.title: hb_unicode_eastasian_width_func_t ()
refsect2.programlisting: unsigned int (*hb_unicode_eastasian_width_func_t) (hb_unicode_funcs_t *ufuncs, hb_codepoint_t unicode, void *user_data);

warning.para: hb_unicode_eastasian_width_func_t has been deprecated since version 2.0.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: A virtual method for the hb_unicode_funcs_t structure.

entry.para: User data pointer passed by the caller

refsect2.title: hb_unicode_eastasian_width ()

warning.para: hb_unicode_eastasian_width has been deprecated since version 2.0.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Don't use. Not used by HarfBuzz.

refsect2.title: hb_unicode_funcs_set_eastasian_width_func ()
refsect2.programlisting: void hb_unicode_funcs_set_eastasian_width_func (hb_unicode_funcs_t *ufuncs, hb_unicode_eastasian_width_func_t func, void *user_data, hb_destroy_func_t destroy);

warning.para: hb_unicode_funcs_set_eastasian_width_func has been deprecated since version 2.0.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the implementation function for hb_unicode_eastasian_width_func_t.

entry.para: The function to call when user_data is not needed anymore.

refsect2.title: hb_unicode_decompose_compatibility_func_t ()
refsect2.programlisting: unsigned int (*hb_unicode_decompose_compatibility_func_t) (hb_unicode_funcs_t *ufuncs, hb_codepoint_t u, hb_codepoint_t *decomposed, void *user_data);

warning.para: hb_unicode_decompose_compatibility_func_t has been deprecated since version 2.0.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Fully decompose u to its Unicode compatibility decomposition. The codepoints of the decomposition will be written to decomposed . The complete length of the decomposition will be returned.
If u has no compatibility decomposition, zero should be returned.

The Unicode standard guarantees that a buffer of length HB_UNICODE_MAX_DECOMPOSITION_LEN codepoints will always be sufficient for any compatibility decomposition plus an terminating value of 0. Consequently, decompose must be allocated by the caller to be at least this length. Implementations of this function type must ensure that they do not write past the provided array.

entry.para: address of codepoint array (of length HB_UNICODE_MAX_DECOMPOSITION_LEN) to write decomposition into
user data pointer as passed to hb_unicode_funcs_set_decompose_compatibility_func()

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: number of codepoints in the full compatibility decomposition of u , or 0 if no decomposition available.

refsect2.title: hb_unicode_decompose_compatibility ()
refsect2.programlisting: unsigned int hb_unicode_decompose_compatibility (hb_unicode_funcs_t *ufuncs, hb_codepoint_t u, hb_codepoint_t *decomposed);

warning.para: hb_unicode_decompose_compatibility has been deprecated since version 2.0.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Fetches the compatibility decomposition of a Unicode code point. Deprecated.

refsect2.title: hb_unicode_funcs_set_decompose_compatibility_func ()
refsect2.programlisting: void hb_unicode_funcs_set_decompose_compatibility_func (hb_unicode_funcs_t *ufuncs, hb_unicode_decompose_compatibility_func_t func, void *user_data, hb_destroy_func_t destroy);

warning.para: hb_unicode_funcs_set_decompose_compatibility_func has been deprecated since version 2.0.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.

entry.para: The function to call when user_data is not needed anymore.

refsect2.title: hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_v_kerning_func ()
refsect2.programlisting: void hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_v_kerning_func (hb_font_funcs_t *ffuncs, hb_font_get_glyph_v_kerning_func_t func, void *user_data, hb_destroy_func_t destroy);

warning.para: hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_v_kerning_func has been deprecated since version 2.0.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the implementation function for hb_font_get_glyph_v_kerning_func_t.

entry.para: The function to call when user_data is not needed anymore.

refsect2.title: hb_font_get_glyph_shape ()
refsect2.programlisting: void hb_font_get_glyph_shape (hb_font_t *font, hb_codepoint_t glyph, hb_draw_funcs_t *dfuncs, void *draw_data);

warning.para: hb_font_get_glyph_shape has been deprecated since version 7.0.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.
Use hb_font_draw_glyph() instead

refsect2.para:
Fetches the glyph shape that corresponds to a glyph in the specified font . The shape is returned by way of calls to the callbacks of the dfuncs
objects, with draw_data passed to them.

entry.para: User data to pass to draw callbacks

refsect2.title: hb_font_get_glyph_shape_func_t ()
refsect2.programlisting: void (*hb_font_get_glyph_shape_func_t) (hb_font_t *font, void *font_data, hb_codepoint_t glyph, hb_draw_funcs_t *draw_funcs, void *draw_data, void *user_data);

warning.para: hb_font_get_glyph_shape_func_t has been deprecated since version 7.0.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.
Use hb_font_draw_glyph_func_t instead

refsect2.para: A virtual method for the hb_font_funcs_t of an hb_font_t object.

entry.para: The draw functions to send the shape data to
The data accompanying the draw functions
User data pointer passed by the caller

refsect2.title: hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_shape_func ()
refsect2.programlisting: void hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_shape_func (hb_font_funcs_t *ffuncs, hb_font_get_glyph_shape_func_t func, void *user_data, hb_destroy_func_t destroy);

warning.para: hb_font_funcs_set_glyph_shape_func has been deprecated since version 7.0.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.
Use hb_font_funcs_set_draw_glyph_func() instead

refsect2.para: Sets the implementation function for hb_font_get_glyph_shape_func_t, which is the same as hb_font_draw_glyph_func_t.

entry.para: The function to call when user_data is not needed anymore.

refsect2.title: hb_font_get_glyph_v_kerning ()
refsect2.programlisting: hb_position_t hb_font_get_glyph_v_kerning (hb_font_t *font, hb_codepoint_t top_glyph, hb_codepoint_t bottom_glyph);

warning.para: hb_font_get_glyph_v_kerning has been deprecated since version 2.0.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Fetches the kerning-adjustment value for a glyph-pair in the specified font, for vertical text segments.
refsect2.note: It handles legacy kerning only (as returned by the corresponding hb_font_funcs_t function).

entry.para: The glyph ID of the top glyph in the glyph pair
The glyph ID of the bottom glyph in the glyph pair

refsect2.programlisting: #define HB_BUFFER_FLAGS_DEFAULT HB_BUFFER_FLAG_DEFAULT

warning.para: HB_BUFFER_FLAGS_DEFAULT has been deprecated since version 0.9.20 and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.programlisting: #define HB_MATH_GLYPH_PART_FLAG_EXTENDER HB_OT_MATH_GLYPH_PART_FLAG_EXTENDER

refsect2.title: HB_OT_MATH_SCRIPT
refsect2.programlisting: #define HB_OT_MATH_SCRIPT HB_OT_TAG_MATH_SCRIPT

warning.para: HB_OT_MATH_SCRIPT has been deprecated since version 3.4.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.note: Previous versions of this documentation recommended passing HB_OT_MATH_SCRIPT to hb_buffer_set_script() to enable math shaping, but this usage is no longer supported. Use HB_SCRIPT_MATH instead.

refsect2.title: hb_ot_var_axis_t

refsect2.title: HB_UNICODE_MAX_DECOMPOSITION_LEN
refsect2.programlisting: #define HB_UNICODE_MAX_DECOMPOSITION_LEN (18+1) /* codepoints */

warning.para: HB_UNICODE_MAX_DECOMPOSITION_LEN has been deprecated since version 2.0.0 and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: See Unicode 6.1 for details on the maximum decomposition length.

refsect2.title: hb_font_get_glyph_v_kerning_func_t
refsect2.programlisting: typedef hb_font_get_glyph_kerning_func_t hb_font_get_glyph_v_kerning_func_t;

warning.para: hb_font_get_glyph_v_kerning_func_t is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: A virtual method for the hb_font_funcs_t of an hb_font_t object.
This method should retrieve the kerning-adjustment value for a glyph-pair in the specified font, for vertical text segments.
